评论概述: Nice top, but different fabric, different buttons
评论详情: The lace design sleeves are nice. The top is comfortable and looks good with jeans.  The Amazon description of the top says “60% Polyester, 35% Rayon, 5% Spandex,” but the fabric tag inside the top says, “Cotton, Spandex.”  Also, the main photo of the top shows the blue top with white buttons, so I wondered why the top that was shipped to me has tan colored, wood-looking buttons. The white buttons pictured in the main photo give the blue top a nicer look.  True to size.

I got the wine red shirt in an XXL, I'm 5'10" and 195lbs (typically wear a size 12 US) and it can oftentimes be difficult to find long sleeved shirts that are long enough in the arms because of my height but this shirt is just the right fit/length in the sleeves. I prefer a looser fit in tops, so I went XXL and I'm glad for it because it has just the right amount of room for my style. The lace sleeves and the colour held up in the wash, the fabric is super soft and comfortable.

A definite winner for my wardrobe!!!

Lovely and soft Long sleeve T-shirt material with beautiful lace, long sleeves is so soft and comfortable. I really adore the light weight of the lace sleeves besides how beautiful they look. I ordered my regular size and it fit perfectly. The design is a fabulous casual dressy look. it washes up very nice. I use cold water and low dry. The main thing for me is how fresh ,feminine and comfortable this design is. I am so happy I ordered this lace sleeve top.
This shirt is basic with some flair! The sleeves give it a little sexiness while the material is soft and cozy. Definitely a great shirt for fall outfits! It also fit as expected.

This top is elegant with its long sleeve lace design, offering a beautiful style suitable for all occasions. The fabric is lightweight and comfortable, making it ideal for spring, fall, and even some cool summer nights.  This top offers a perfect blend of versatility and subtle allure, thanks to its thoughtful design. The seven wooden buttons adorning the front provide options for styling: they can be worn slightly open to create a more enticing, relaxed look or fully buttoned for a classic, rounded neckline. This flexibility allows the wearer to effortlessly transition between a more casual or sophisticated appearance, depending on the occasion.  Although the color is described as Lake Blue, I would consider it more of a green, which perfectly complements my red hair. It washes well in cold water, maintaining its quality. This top is an excellent deal for its price point.
Love this top, love the color and the in style sleeves. Very stretchy and long. The buttons down the front give it extra style. Great tee top.
This shirt fits great. Very comfortable and light weight material. The length is great as well. Shirt looks just like the picture.

评论概述: This fits good, love the sexy lace long sleeves
评论详情: This will be good to wear anywhere and looks great.

Love the lace sleeve detail. Takes it from casual to a little dressy and keeps it cool. Fabric is a typical stretchy jersey material and very comfortable. I did already snag the lace a bit with a wayward fingernail, but that's on me. Just be careful.

I love the deep color of this red! The shirt is soft and comfortable. I washed and dried it right out of the package and didn’t have any issues with pilling or loose strings. Perfect for fall—definitely a new favorite in my wardrobe!

My new Minetom Henley long sleeve lace shirt is beautiful. The material is soft, the lace is very light and airy, and the sleeves and length are perfect for my small size.  There are seven wooden buttons, which adds additional class to this terrific shirt.  The seams are smooth and there are no hanging threads.  Nice.I can wear this tucked or untucked, as shown in my pictures, and I will always wash it in cold water and no heat.  Don’t want it to lose its beautiful shape.  I am very, very happy with my new Minetom shirt.Highly recommend.

This blouse is soft and comfortable, with fabric best suited for moderate weather. It's a Henley style with smooth, untextured fabric for the body and lace sleeves w/smooth cuffs. The lace is comfortable and doesn't irritate the skin. The stitching is decent and the buttons are all sewn on securely. I ordered the Lake Blue color, and it almost matches the photos. In person, it's more of a combination of aqua and mint green. It's a pretty color that's close enough for me. If you like your tops on the loose side, I'd order a size or two larger. I'm 5'2" and thin and I ordered the XL. It's nice and roomy without looking too big or long.

I love this “dressy” take on such a well known shirt as the henly. The size is good, the sleeves a bit long, falls nicely over the hips.  It’s well made from a nice soft fabric. The sleeves dress it up and makes it more versatile to wear even on a summer’s eve. Care is easy enough; cold wash, tumble dry, iron if necessary. The color is as depicted online. If you’re tired of the plain button up henley, spruce up your wardrobe with a couple of these! You can’t go wrong.

The material of this top is so soft and of really good quality. It’s very pretty, and I love that the arms are see through lace, adding a delicate touch. It’s very comfortable and exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend!
